statements: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT department, position FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC, salary ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS num_employees FROM employees GROUP BY department
SELECT id, name, position, salary FROM employees WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM payroll WHERE pay_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, hours_worked, rate_per_hour, total_pay FROM payroll ORDER BY total_pay DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department, salary FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, pay_date, hours_worked, total_pay FROM payroll JOIN employees ON payroll.employee_id = employees.employee_id WHERE hours_worked > 40;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM Employee ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, salary FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT first_name, position FROM Employee WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM Employee ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT department_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Department JOIN Employee ON Department.department_id = Employee.employee_id GROUP BY department_name, location;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, p.salary FROM Employee e JOIN Payroll p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE p.salary > 50000;
SELECT AVG(salary) AS avg_salary, MAX(salary) AS max_salary FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT employee_id, name, salary FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE manager_id = 101;
SELECT employee_id, name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY name;
SELECT name, position, amount FROM employees INNER JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id WHERE amount > 50000;
SELECT name, department, position FROM employees JOIN positions ON employees.position = positions.position_name;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(DISTINCT manager_id) AS num_managers FROM departments GROUP BY department_name HAVING num_managers > 1;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employees ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, amount FROM employees JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id;
SELECT department_name, position_title FROM departments JOIN positions ON departments.department_id = positions.department_id ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, amount FROM employees INNER JOIN salaries ON employees.employee_id = salaries.employee_id WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE employees.employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT position_title, department_name FROM positions JOIN departments ON positions.department_id = departments.department_id ORDER BY position_title ASC;
